entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character who sets off at a sprint with Hermione behind him.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is following Harry and they are both trying to sneak over to Hagrid's house.

entities.name: whomping willow
entities.description: The Whomping Willow is a tree that they need to skirt around.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is the gamekeeper who lives in a house near the forest and receives a knock on his door.

entities.name: hagrid's house
entities.description: Hagrid's house is located near the forest where Harry and Hermione are trying to sneak over.

relationships.description: Harry sets off at a sprint with Hermione behind him.
They skirted around the Whomping Willow as they tore toward the shelter of the forest.
As they glimpsed the front of Hagrid's house, they heard a knock upon his door.
As they glimpsed the front of Hagrid's house, they heard a knock upon his door.
